    • Method Detail

      • countFiles

        public static int countFiles(java.io.File folder,
                             boolean countOnlyThisFolder,
                             java.lang.String... extras)
        Counts the files in a folder recursive
        Parameters:
        folder - File to be searched
        countOnlyThisFolder - Boolean True if it should only count files in the given directory or False if it count ALL files in all directories in the folder
        extras - String array with extra parameter, the first is for the extension, and all others are to test if the file name contains something, place a ! before names to invert it
        Returns:
        Int with number of files that agree to the extras parameter
